DOC.brief_summary: This Phase I , open-label , dose-escalating , study safety tolerability KU-0059436 combination DTIC treatment patient advance melanoma previously receive systemic cytotoxic chemotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Safety Pharmacokinetics Inhibitor PARP Combination With Dacarbazine
DOC.criteria: Patients must : 1 . Unresectable stage 3 stage 4 cutaneous melanoma unknown primary melanoma metastasis . 2 . Histological cytological confirmation melanoma . Histological confirmation melanoma primary site suffice , unless primary site unknown . Previous treatment cytotoxic chemotherapy advance melanoma , apart treatment melanoma isolate limb perfusion . Radiotherapy ( except palliative reason ) , endocrine therapy , immunotherapy use investigational agent within 4 week prior trial entry ( long period depend defined characteristic agent use ) . Major surgery within 4 week start study .
